alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Gibson; Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 8:28PM CDT until March 27 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee... Obion River near Obion For the Obion River...including Martin, Obion, Bogota...Minor flooding is occurring. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Obion River near Obion. * WHEN...From Monday morning to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, farmland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 33.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 34.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
